Name: X-linked juvenile retinoschisis 1
Definition: A retinoschisis characterized by schisis (splitting) of the neural retina leading to reduced visual acuity in males due that has_material_basis_in the RS1 gene on chromosome Xp22.

Name: bullous retinoschisis
Definition: An optic nerve disease that results_in inflammation located_in optic nerve which may cause a complete or partial loss of vision.

Name: obsolete vitamin A deficiency with xerophthalmic corneal scar
Definition: An optic nerve disease that results_in inflammation located_in optic nerve which may cause a complete or partial loss of vision.
Synonym: vitamin A deficiency with xerophthalmic scars of cornea (disorder)

Name: obsolete nerve deafness
Definition: An optic nerve disease that results_in inflammation located_in optic nerve which may cause a complete or partial loss of vision.

Name: obsolete streptococcal pharyngitis
Definition: A commensal streptococcal infectious disease that involves infection of the pharynx and sometimes the larynx and tonsils. It is caused by Group A Streptococcus bacteria. The common symptoms include fever

Name: flat retinoschisis
Definition: A syndrome that is characterized by absence or underdeveloped tissue connecting the left and right halves of the brain
